Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.socket

Class ServerHandler

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.socket.ServerHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameActions, HeartBeatListener, VirtualServer, Runnable, Remote
public class ServerHandler extends Thread implements VirtualServer
Server Handler processes and sends the incoming commands to ClientSocket.
